channel.title: Internals on Praxis
channel.description: Recent content in Internals on Praxis

item.title: Quick Links
item.description:
Suggestion Boxes

fill in the correct form for any subject you want us to work on

  • Proposed a study group topic
  • Propose new media for study topic
  • Directions for a new Soundboard and Soundboard HackMD Template - You can also just create a “New notes from template” in HackMD

Progress Trackers and Announcements

  • Praxis mastodon instance
  • Praxis Activity Log (ask for credentials to edit)

Tools

ask someone in the group for credentials

  • HackMD
  • Airtable
  • Jitsi
  • Updated Team List

item.title: Soundboard
item.description:
how to request a soundboard

  1. copy soundboard template
  2. create new note and title it
  3. answer questions, add any other relevant infoemation
  4. change permissions to everyone (ask group if confused)
  5. share it with praxis signal group for consideration ]

how to prepare a public soundboard

  1. decide on a date
  2. add date to praxis calendar
  3. add hackmd note link to calendar
  4. create zoom link (ask camille), add date and zoom link on note
  5. promote note with date on mastodon

how to announce a soundboard to outsiders

  1. what’s praxis
  2. what’s soundboard
  3. what’s this soundboard (topic, format, desired goals can)

soundboard debrief

how to prepare for a private soundboard

pending

item.title: Editing this website
item.description:
Praxis uses Hugo framework and is hosted on Github pages.

Pages are markdown + frontmatter on Any page under content folder will be visible on the website, using format: praxis.nyc/(folder name)/(filename minus .md)

To edit pages you’ll need to:

  1. Learn markdown basics
  2. Create a gitlab account
  3. Inform team to be added to repo’s project members
  4. Visit Gitlab IDE to edit
  5. Ask around for content templates, so frontmatter is correct
  6. Commit all your changes (you’ll need a message)

Troubleshooting:
